entities.description: Harry is being threatened by Lucius Malfoy's servant.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a loyal and protective elf who has been given a sock by Harry.

entities.name: lucius malfoy
entities.description: Lucius Malfoy is the father of Draco Malfoy and is angry at Dobby for protecting Harry.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: Draco Malfoy's father is Lucius Malfoy.

relationships.description: Dobby protects Harry from Lucius Malfoy's servant.
Lucius Malfoy is the father of Draco Malfoy.
